website_summaries.verdict: This fine powder mixes classic boric acid with a lure that attracts roaches. It kills within 72 hours and keeps killing for weeks, as long as it stays dry.
pros: Kills insects for weeks after application, as long as it's kept dry
Insects die within 72 hours of contact
Included puffer straw lets you apply in difficult to reach areas
Can use in home with children and pets
cons: Must stay dry to work effectively
Labeled as pet-safe, but consider spraying the powder where pets can't get to it

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! When I first ordered it I had my doubts because German Cockroaches took over my building and pest control came multiple times it didn’t help. They were EVERYWHERE in bulk and variety. I started lookig to move out but I didnt want them to cling to any funiture and move with me...I was disgusted, frustrated, embarassed, ugh you name. It’s been nearly two months since I used this stuff and It’s like I never had them to begin with!
customer_reviews.author: MurAbi

customer_reviews.title: It worked!
customer_reviews.text: I live in a small apartment and the kitchen was infested with German roaches. We tried everything and those buggers wouldn't go away. We bought this product and used it as indicated and 2 weeks later...no more roaches. We put it behind all the appliances and across all the edges on the floor and countertops. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: IT REALLY WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I have an older house so I would randomly see a water bug outside at night and maybe one in the bathroom from time to time. I noticed that there’s a gap in the wall behind the front door and figured that’s how they get in. I ordered the product on Saturday and received the product Sunday and used it that night and Monday morning I found 2 dead water bugs in the house. So the boric acid definitely works fast!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for the roaches on steroids!
customer_reviews.text: I live in the Deep South where if you want to be nice you call them palmetto bugs! I’m not nice,the American cockroach that is literally as big as a mouse,this doesn’t even phase them! I have all food sealed,keep sugars in the fridge and what not. They are after water,compost(don’t have that)and warmth. Trials with this product does not phase these roaches on steroids! I’m finished,put it everywhere even on top of them! Tonight one I dosed and any others are hanging out coming through the air vents. This does nothing!
customer_reviews.author: Valentina

customer_reviews.title: It. Killed. All. Of. Them.
customer_reviews.text: Applied at 10 pm. 24hours later: 40 dead roaches on floor. 48 hours later, 100 dead roaches on floor. Little disgusting but better than them being alive and in the walls.
customer_reviews.author: Jomo

customer_reviews.title: worked great. I put it all around the perimeter of ...
customer_reviews.text: worked great. I put it all around the perimeter of my house, under cabinets, behind refrigerator, i saw less and less bugs until after a few weeks they were totally gone.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Stone

customer_reviews.title: Boric Acid with Lure Powder
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works. I went on YouTube and viewed a guy who tore the top layer of a piece of cardboard off exposing the ribbed and lower layers. He put Roach Powder in the rows and there you have the perfect the trap. When you have had enough, toss out the piece of cardboard and make another one. Make sure it is not place anywhere a pet or child can get it. The roaches are coming up dead--from day one and they are still being found dead. No live ones anymore. This is in a rental. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Marty L.

customer_reviews.title: I was pretty dubious that putting some white powder on the floor ...
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty dubious that putting some white powder on the floor would keep the roaches away, but it's been two months now and I haven't seen a single cockroach since I applied this stuff! No ants either. I would say the straw applicator felt like an afterthought, and it came un-stuck from the bottle after a minute. Simply pouring the powder out of the bottle works fine though!

customer_reviews.title: This is wonderful, effective, clean stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful, effective, clean stuff. After 30" of rain from Hurricane Harvey, tree roaches from the whole neighborhood headed for my garage and house which stayed dry (luckily). I was going crazy seeing them at all hours of the day and night! It's very neat to use the applicator to create a clean line of the powder next to kitchen baseboards and inside my kitchen tool drawer along all sides, under washer in garage. Two days later I saw no more tree roaches (Palmetto bugs) and over a week later there are none. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Hane in Houston

customer_reviews.title: The best decision
customer_reviews.text: I had a reallybad Roach problem. In may 2017 I went on vacation to visit family and left my husband alone for two weeks. When I came back, my house was infested with roaches they were everywhere, but mostly in the kitchen. I paid an exterminator for almost a year to come in and do something. He would come in twice a month, spray for and set traps for about 10 minutes and then he would go. My roaches lessened in number but they never went away. This year when I went away, I had my husband spread around this powder (also the tablets) and I haven’t seen any roaches in the last three months.
customer_reviews.author: Dayanara

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews but I think this is a fake product. The bottle was not sealed when it arrived. We still used it. However, we witnessed a few times that roaches and even ants ran by the powder but were still alive. We still left the powder there in the kitchen, around the countertop and on the floor for a few weeks but there are still roaches running. I remember my sister bought the same product at HomeDepot years ago and it worked really well. This powder could be fake. I had to buy Hot Shot at HomeDepot instead, and they are sealed really well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked in a Week
customer_reviews.text: Researched Youtube, the People said BORIC ACID powder, the Professionals said everything else. I found that sprinkling Harris Roach Powder (boric acid) around the kitchen baseboards and counter top edges worked. Took about 7-10 days, but no roaches in kitchen. SIDENOTE: I tried mixing boric acid, egg yolk and sugar to make the "putty" , but no success. Roaches didn't like my cooking, I guess. Just the boric acid did the trick. It's beautiful when something just works. Highly recommend (Harris) boric acid.
customer_reviews.author: Brother J

customer_reviews.title: It is effective but STINKS like moth balls
customer_reviews.text: It is effective but STINKS like moth balls. I guess that's the 'lure' odor. Definitely not for inside use. I will just go back to plain Borax, which is the cheapest and most effective.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't move to a new home without it.
customer_reviews.text: Over the last 40 years, I've rented some apartments and houses that were...how can I say it ?... real ratholes. Roaches have not been a problem since meeting my bride-to-be, for it was her chemistry teacher father who taught me about boric acid. Placing a small amount along baseboards, behind appliances and in the crannies will clear infestation from an entire building, even if only one apartment is treated. I always have some of this on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Peregrin

customer_reviews.title: At long last, something actually kiis roaches
customer_reviews.text: After trying many different products that claimed to rid my house of roaches and other nasty bugs, I finally found something that works exactly as advertised. Within one week after applying Harris Boric Acid as directed, I began seeing only DEAD roaches & silverfish bugs where I had previously seen an invasion of those live nasty filthy bugs. Thank God for Harris Boric Acid. Now my kitchen, pantry, and bathrooms are free of all filthy insects. What an incredible product.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Allen

customer_reviews.title: doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I have bought Boric acid in past with good results however this stuff is fluffed. I placed in camper in cracks and cabinets for month prior to trip. However found 2 large roaches one of which I placed portion in this product directly on belly of bug, even after 2 hours bug was still alive on back in this case a shoe was more successful.
customer_reviews.author: darryl perron

customer_reviews.title: Stop what you’re doing and buy this.
customer_reviews.text: Yes. This is the product you want. Stop scrolling. Buy this. You know how it goes in low income apartments, trust me, you want this. And these tablets! Frick those hotshot roach houses. They’re literally houses for roaches. That’s it. That’s where they will live, not where they will die. But this. This is a gift from the gods. Oh, pro tip, I use it with a mask and compressed air to blow it under the fridge or into the backs of bookshelves. It’s safe, I promise.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT FOR FIRE ANTS
customer_reviews.text: I use this powder in Texas, where fire ants are a huge problem. One application, and the mound is completely gone the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Even though I read all of the reviews of how great this works, it didn’t work AT ALL! Roaches walked through it! It was a complete waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: This is all you need...
customer_reviews.text: You don't need exotic chemicals and questionable poisons to get rid of many types of insects. We used this product in two different locations in the past... one in a home and once in a business establishment. Don't know that I ever saw a roach after applying and giving it a week or so to do it's stuff. Highly recommended. You can apply it behind baseboards in a remodel and I guess the stuff would work for years. It sure seemed to for us.
customer_reviews.author: connortn

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: I had using different boric acid products in the past, they worked really well. But this one is terrible and a bad smell, Roaches walked over it! It was a complete waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Aditya Agrawal

customer_reviews.title: Amazed how this stuff works
customer_reviews.text: Live in apartment complex and generally keep my place clean. Not sure about my neighbors as I do see cockroaches from time to time. Ive tried other “gel” baits and traps but they only work for a few days or so. I’ve had this powder for about two months and I still have no need to reapply. Every now and then I’ll see a random dead roach so I know this stuff is still effective. My neighbors should be thanking me for keeping the cockroaches at bay using this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Snag

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF TIME AND MONEY
customer_reviews.text: This product is a waste of money, instead of killing the roaches, it coursed a major growth and increase in population. I would see a roach or 2 here and there but now I'm seeing dozens of them everywhere and it grossly keeps getting worse. I bought this trying to go a less dangerous way because of my pets and children but now I'm having to spend more money and buy advion that actually kills roaches which means now I have to keep my pets away from the bugs and make sure my kids don't touch the bug killer. Thanks for sucking so bad..
customer_reviews.author: James hunt

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but a bit messy use
customer_reviews.text: Unlike sprays and gels, this is in powder form. Similar looking to flour. Spay into corners of room or edge of floor wherever you may need it. Looks like you left flour over your room. I applied it around my house and roaches are gone. They take back their bait to their family to destroy the nest. Don't waste your money on anything else. PS. The typical roach sprays are heavy in smells and the formula needs to be improved constantly as the roaches get used to it. That's why they always say on their can "new & improved" . Also, you never know how old the formula is that you are using. My exterminator recommended this boric acid instead.
customer_reviews.author: Jor El

customer_reviews.title: Oh!! This WILL do it!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST product I've used to combat the war between the roaches and myself! I live in Louisiana......the bug capital of the U.S. it since moving here it has been truly a battle! But I can honestly say that this product makes living here a whole lot easier! I have tried the plain boric acid and it decreased the amount of those critters. But this......this product is the bomb!!! They eat and they die simple. No smelly fumes, no mess. Just place it in the areas where the nest and that's it! This is my second purchase. I generally need I a year!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about this product
customer_reviews.text: Just bought - I decided to purchase the boric acid power after reading some reviews. Not really sure if it works as described, but I went for it. What REALLY disappointed me was that the bottle came HALF FULL not fair. Its a BIG bottle why selling it like this. I bought 2 bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Digna

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my gross ex boyfriend. His house is full of roaches, stinkbugs and mice. It freaked me out. I cleaned and trapped and sprayed like crazy every time I visited. This roach powder was a real help. (Those bottles gave me the courage to go in his house.) I am so glad I got rid of that gross old man. I left the roach powder tho. Partly as a gift, partly as a suggestion! Lol
customer_reviews.author: HighMileageFeets

customer_reviews.title: Roach Food?
customer_reviews.text: I'm almost 100% sure of it- my Roaches are getting bigger! my dog won't leave my side. and one of the kids is missing.
customer_reviews.author: Rick S.

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I had a minor roach problem in my kitchen so I poured it everywhere downstairs cause I knew they were going to run other places where the powder didn't exist anyway at first I thought the product wasn't working until I start seeing dead roaches left behind it definitely killed them with ease simple as 123
customer_reviews.author: octavia paris

customer_reviews.title: Actually works
customer_reviews.text: I tried some of those roach traps that you set around and they didn't seem to do anything but attract more roaches. With this you can see the tracks in the powder lessen over a period of just a few days. Left some behind the stove, fridge and behind cabinet drawers just in case of a re-infestation. Overall very happy with how quickly this worked.
customer_reviews.author: Eric W. Harding

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't seem like the roaches like it yet they're actively decreasing
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't seem like the roaches like it yet they're actively decreasing. Although we did build our own trap to further attract them and keep our pets out. like a simple banana peel trap you can make for flies. just make a little bigger hole and it serves well with a roach motel using this stuff. easier disposal. the regular roach traps don't work out here, especially during the humid summers when they get too big for most traps. so this has been working out pretty well. but I'm not sure it's added lure actually attracts them to it.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Bottle almost empty
customer_reviews.text: I am truly disappointed the summer months has brought many bugs and im tired of using spray. This bottle is almost empty. Im pretty sure whoever shipped this knew it was almost empty bt shipped it anyway. I do not if u wont post this review but it is the honest truth. Will be returning!
customer_reviews.author: Candygirl19

customer_reviews.title: THIS REALLY WORKS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the powder in April 2018 and so far I have not seen one roach, Thank God!!!!......I tried many other things natural or otherwise and this has worked so far....I bought the tablets, also.... UPDATE: I will continue using this product as this is the ONLY ONE that I have found after trying everything that is available! I am glad that I don't have to breathe in the poison sprays from other products!...I would do a "commercial" for this product that is how much I think of this product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: O. S.

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t seen any roaches after a week of putting this boric acid around the spots they were at most (kitchen sink, bathroom & garbage can) this definitely works, especially if the problem is mild to moderate. My problem was moderate. If your problem is severe, you may have to pair this with something else that’s stronger. But this works so try this first before moving to other steps!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa M. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Buy this of you want to get rid of roaches
customer_reviews.text: Found 1 big roach on mu kitchen and almost had a stroke. Decided to buy this and give it a try. 3 days of action and I saw the first roach walking dizzy. Next week found 1 small roach dead and no more big roaches walking at night 3 weeks after use, 2 baby roaches dead in 2 differente days. 1 month after use no roaches at all! Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: Wiped out silverfish
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after exterminator friend recommended I try boric acid to ward off silver fish. Tried sticky traps and paper squares but still found creepy crawlers....so far, since putting this down around the perimeter of our upstairs rooms two weeks ago, not a single bug. Hopefully this takes care of the problem long term.
customer_reviews.author: reesecat

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend this product for roaches
customer_reviews.text: This really works!! I could not get rid of the roaches when I moved into my apartment. I sprayed and had a professional bug spray done twice but they always came back in a day or two. Once I realized they were coming from the back of a new refrigerator they installed just before I moved in, I was able to use the powder and drive them out and they died!!! They are gone now and I can sleep again.
customer_reviews.author: DMJ

customer_reviews.title: Works before I even used it.
customer_reviews.text: It works even before I use it. A roach got caught in the tape that holds the applicator haha This. Stuff. Works. My house consistently has roaches, since the whole block of homes is connected. I used this and bug spray. Killed every bug that I saw but this stuff took care of everything in btwn. Hadn't seen one in months.
customer_reviews.author: Tina X

customer_reviews.title: Not sure I still see bugs
customer_reviews.text: I followed instruction and STILL see these BIG A S S waterbugs palmetto bugs cockroaches however you want to call them here in texas these ugly mf’ers fly they are huge and horrible to see. I put this stuff everywhere granted I found some dead ones so maybe it works but I want to keep them at bay.
customer_reviews.author: Diamond Girl

customer_reviews.title: Long Term Results
customer_reviews.text: You can rely on this stuff to work long term. Was plagued by the extra large ones in my carport, just all over the place at night. I sprinkled all along the wall in the carport and on my front porch and steps. No more bugs of any sort. If you have a bit of a chronic problem with them, reapply every month in the summer and spring, light dusting anywhere they might be. Be patient and your problem will go away. If it's a really bad infestation use in conjunction with Bengal Spray. Follow all the directions for safety! Happy exterminating!
customer_reviews.author: Ambient Connoisseur

customer_reviews.title: Traps caught an easy 50 over two weeks
customer_reviews.text: Had many roaches traversing my sink and area daily. Laid this down under microwave and all their spots along with sticky traps. Traps caught an easy 50 over two weeks, and I could see dying roaches in my kitchen. Over 2 weeks, I went from seeing 4 a day to 0. Have plenty left. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good product, try it you will like it, and the bugs will hate you
customer_reviews.text: We just started using it s o far it work we only saw one roach passing through, I don't think he found the. Stuff because he was alive when I saw him so I killed him. I haven't seen another one so it must be working. My husband is the one that used the product so I could just give a basic review. Yes I would recommend it. I have already told others to try it
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Wanted something more pet friendly
customer_reviews.text: I got this out of a sense of urgency but discovered diatomaceous earth after I received this, which is more pet friendly. It requires spreading with a specific device which I love, but so far haven't been very good using it. I will get there, though. However, it's too late to return this product. With 4 dogs in the house, I had to get something more pet friendly. It could fit your needs, though, so I cannot judge for you.
customer_reviews.author: LaineyBell

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: I'm torn because I didn't buy this specifically for roaches, but after putting it down I still had issues with carpet beetles and silverfish. It may have killed some, but it feels like it didn't even dent our population of carpet beetle larva. Super easy to apply and all, and it vacuumed up easily a few weeks later when I was tired of having white powder all over my baseboards, but it didn't live up to the claims that boric acid would kill bug infestations.
customer_reviews.author: L. H.

customer_reviews.title: This product has NEVER let me down!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff will COMPLETELY get rid of roaches! (If you do a good thorough job). My apt was infested with roaches but would be 3-4 days til my landlord could get someone out so I got this stuff and just walked around my apt squirting a line along the baseboards and before 24 hrs even passed, not a roach anywhere. When exterminator arrived he said he’d never seen someone able to take care of such a problem as I did. It was all this boric acids doing!! AMAZING STUFF
customer_reviews.author: Pam Roper

customer_reviews.title: Use it right away you won’t disappoint!! Highly highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I can’t thank enough for the manufacturer. We had infestation near the dishwasher and tried combat bait advion bait it reduced the number but still we used to see few of them during night. This time we tried this and it really worked wonders it took ten days to two week time but now we are sleeping peacefully. I highly recommend this one. It works !!
customer_reviews.author: Chatjmail

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Works very well against German cockroaches in Dallas Texas. Easy to use, good coverage, no problems with cat around it. Tried the tablets but didn't see any results. The gel works well with gaps or openings to plug up but it is very expensive. This powder is the best solution for me. I put thin lines where I wanted and it worked fast and for a long time. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it works!
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff! We used to heat with wood and would often get bugs from the whole process. This stuff gets rid of them! You have to give it a couple of weeks, put in in dry areas and I promise it will get the job done! I used to buy roach prufe and it was awesome! I can’t find that brand anymore, but this seems to be as good for many bugs!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra J. Fischer

customer_reviews.title: KILLS COCKROACHES - PERIOD!
customer_reviews.text: I live in Houston, TX, and went around my entire house and put this in the weep holes. Within the next 2-3 days I kept finding dead cockroaches in the garage and in the house. This stuff really works, but it does not kill cockroaches instantly like some think it's supposed to do. The bottle says that it may take up to 72 hours to kill cockroaches. I just ordered 2 more bottles to keep handy in case I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Roach don't eat bait
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it works for other people. But it doesn't work for me at all. The problem is Roach that don't eat bait. I have to desine buy other styles bait of insecticide from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Blues-harp

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY- IT DOESNT WORK
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I got the ineffective batch. I had placed this on my carpet, tiles, and trash bag for over 24 hours. The infestation didn't get any better. On top of that, there was no "lure" factor. I'm a biochemist and tested this product for its purity. It failed the purity test. The product came half empty and the boric acid is impure. DON'T FALL FOR THEIR TRICKS!!!!!! DONT BUY THIS INEFFECTIVE PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm! I used these because our neighbors has roaches and they started to come over to us. Within a few days, the problem started to decrease, within a month I hardly seen any and now, I see one every blue moon.
customer_reviews.author: ZekieMayaMama2

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I have a moderate roach problem in the kitchen, which was the result of water damage. The formula on this product used to work better. I used to sprinkle the powder on them & they'd be irritated & a couple of days later die off. Now with this new formula they don't die off quickly.
customer_reviews.author: dark41969

customer_reviews.title: It works in combination with other items
customer_reviews.text: I used this in addition to another boric acid, and two different roach bait stations. Plus my regular pest control guy came and put some gel down. I had an issue for about 7 months and there are basically gone seems like. I used raid bait stations and hot shot liquid stations. My pest control guy says ammonia and Windex works too. I didn't get around to trying it because my concoction seems to work now.
customer_reviews.author: Lakeisha

customer_reviews.title: Undecided
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this product a few days so I'm not sure if it's working yet or not. I live in a garden level apartment and discovered cockroaches a few months ago. I keep my kitchen and apartment clean and the landlord has had an exterminator spray in here twice since they started. I'm really hoping that this will help. Will update my review after I've given it more time
customer_reviews.author: Robin H

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for larger roaches
customer_reviews.text: I've never had the smaller, faster, light brown roaches in my home that inhabited every apartment so I don't know about those but it's excellent for the larger, somewhat slower roaches. Easy to apply. There may be excessive health warning. I wouldn't want pets or children getting into it. One application around the affected areas and the bugs were gone in not more than 2 days I think. This year they were back but one application and no bugs to be found the very next day.
customer_reviews.author: Chewthrutherestraints

customer_reviews.title: I hate roaches. This kills roaches.
customer_reviews.text: Saw a couple roaches in the garage at my new house and instead of following my first instinct and torching the place, I bought this instead. Now I see dead roaches every once in a while but haven't seen a live one since I put this down. A thick line in front of the door into the house has prevented me from seeing ANY in the house (dead or alive)
customer_reviews.author: Alex Brown

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I treated the infested areas a few days ago and have made it a point to check every night. It's been three days, I have not yet seen Roaches where I normally see them at night. I am keeping my fingers crossed that it is going to do the job. Thanks for the great product. Will continue to treat the infested areas at intervals.
customer_reviews.author: Anyaole Alama

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Although it took a few weeks to take effect, the product was successful. Initially, we would still see a few roaches in random places where we have not seen them before. Which seemed as if they were finding a different way into the house. However, after a second application in those areas as well, we have not seen a single roach in 2 weeks. We're hopeful that, with the ongoing use of the product, we'll be able to permanently rid our house of these pests.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Roaches fear this product
customer_reviews.text: Harris must have a direct line to the psyche of Roaches. I put a liberal amount of this powder around the edges of my apartment and in the cabinet corners and edges. Voila: large palmetto roaches reduced by 90%. Thank you to Harris. Necessary product for living in the South. I'm in New Orleans, and our roaches are the size of cats!
customer_reviews.author: Donald J. Miester, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: No overnight wonder
customer_reviews.text: This will work IF roaches approach it. If they don't, you're out of luck. The lure doesn't seem to do anything with my roaches and I can't put it out everywhere because I have cats. I put it in the corners out of reach and under the sink and it seems to be working there, but it's slow going at best.
customer_reviews.author: Modern Xena

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: I just moved to North Carolina and I was prepared for all the cockroaches. Some call them Palmetto bugs but they are just cockroaches with a nicer name. This powder works! After the first day of placing it in any open space in my garage (Where I was finding the roaches) the next day,​ I found a few roaches bellied up! Definitely will continue to buy this powder to keep the cockroaches at bay.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey10

customer_reviews.title: Hard to not to get product to give just a fine layer, which is what is needed in order ...
customer_reviews.text: A bit difficult to get out of bottle. The tubing doesn't really fit tightly with the bottle tip, so you have to hold it in place. Hard to not to get product to give just a fine layer, which is what is needed in order for product to work as directed. Not sure how effective it is on roaches, although numbers seemed to decrease within a few days of application. Sygenta Gel Bait is more quickly effective.
customer_reviews.author: bobsie67

customer_reviews.title: The best thing i ever bought this year i recently spend ...
customer_reviews.text: The best thing i ever bought this year i recently spend 100$ worth bugs spray nothing works . l live on 55yr olds apartments in the city i called the exterminator each month nothing works i have electronics pesticides nothing works . Thankful to Harris product after this review i hope your price stay the same you help a lot people leaving old buildings.
customer_reviews.author: RafaNadal

customer_reviews.title: Havent seen a pest in over a month!
customer_reviews.text: Got the job done! Havent seen a pest in over a month. I used 90% of the bottle in one night and basically coated the entire floor and surface area of my kitchen. And I did it before a weeklong trip so that it could sit. Make sure to use to put it in areas where pests have to walk through. Powder is easy clean up also.
customer_reviews.author: Chyann

customer_reviews.title: Bugs be gone
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this to my grandmother if she were alive this product is very good. I had seen some bugs outside my door, so I decided to buy this product. I placed it around my home the next several days I saw several dead bugs lying on the carport. Would recommend this. Yes, yes, yes.
customer_reviews.author: GAYLE JACKSON

customer_reviews.title: Roaches are GONE!
customer_reviews.text: This product actually worked!! Finally got my home back!! Never had a bug problem until moving to an apartment. Tried every other product but still saw roaches. Sprinkled this stuff around my counters, sinks and floors---within 3 days, DEAD roaches everywhere! I cleaned up the dead bugs and powder and repeated everyday for about a week. Continued to see more dead ones for another week or so. It's now been 2 months, and I'm happy to report I haven't seen a single roach since, dead or alive! And I still have half a bottle left in case any come back.
customer_reviews.author: Christina A

customer_reviews.title: This product works!!
customer_reviews.text: The roaches are dying. We had a lot behind our refrigerator,pulled it out and squirted it all along the baseboard . I actually cut a larger piece off the tapered end so more would come out. I put it in all cracks in baseboards and all in the cabinet corners . We are still seeing a few baby bugs and smaller ones coming out and dying.also spiders, earwigs dying. I think this is a great product. Just be sure to wipe up any that is where your pets could get into it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan P Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Wiped out all signs of roaches
customer_reviews.text: I live in Florida. There’s cockroaches everywhere! I was extremely skeptical about this product . How could a powder kill cockroaches? I put it all over the areas that I usually see the roaches in (kitchen) and within two weeks the roaches started to disappear. Within a month I literally cannot find a single roach it’s pretty crazy considering I thought this wouldn’t do anything
customer_reviews.author: Nemo

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work for me
customer_reviews.text: My mom moved into a place that had a few coach roaches that showed up from time to time, I bought her some of this and it don't work. still seeing them on occasion nothing changed.
customer_reviews.author: Big time Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Always good
customer_reviews.text: sprayed a roach with popular name brand killer. Roach said thanks for the shower and scurried away behind the fridge. Thought maybe the spray did him in but a few minutes later Big homie retreats back out in the open, this time covered in powder. Fell off the wall, tried to get back on the wall, froze and then died. This is the only true bug barrier, can't build immunity against getting stabbed, effective forever essentially and safe for household use.
customer_reviews.author: Ninja

customer_reviews.title: The LURE works!
customer_reviews.text: I had roaches in my kitchen, but I won't use harmful pesticides inside my home. I've relied on boric acid powder for years, but this time I wanted to try it with a lure. I looked over the many choices on Amazon and bought Harris Roach Powder With Lure. A month after treatment and my roaches are GONE!
customer_reviews.author: KatpadFalls

customer_reviews.title: No more roaches!
customer_reviews.text: I poured directly along the perimeter of my living room that is the room closest to my front door and under the stove and behind the fridge. After a few weeks no more roaches or if I see any they're already dead. I also put some on the tracks for my sliding glass balcony door and any cracks where the wall meets the door frame.
customer_reviews.author: Varnia W.

customer_reviews.title: Where did they all go??? 🕷👀
customer_reviews.text: After applying this stuff just to the problem areas. I literally don't see any roaches at all (Even in the middle of the night when the lights come on) & I haven't used that much...here's a tip : Use a small paintbrush to put light coatings in problem areas where you don't want to see the white powder, it's that strong & you save even more !👍
customer_reviews.author: Carl P.

customer_reviews.title: Blast the roaches!
customer_reviews.text: Kills ‘em dead. From the minor amount at my house to the major infestation at my cousins. We couldn’t be happier
customer_reviews.author: JB Birmingham, AL

customer_reviews.title: Yasssss it works
customer_reviews.text: This product works. I saw minimal results after extermination by a professional. I used the powder as directed and even put it in the walls as we replaced and sealed every outlet in the house and areas where we saw water bugs. I put it in the basement garage and attic as well. I did not see any bugs within weeks of treatment and almost 9 months later still no sightings or dead or alive. I’m going to retreat the house inside and out again for good measure.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Effective Product
customer_reviews.text: I had a roach infested pantry and applied the product and have only seen two roaches since applying two weeks ago. Based on this, I am pleased with the effectiveness of the product. The problem is in the physical distribution of the product into the deep corners of the pantry. The applicator is difficult to maneuver into these areas and apply the proper amount.
customer_reviews.author: hillrobw

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: Bless your soul if you have to buy this stuff. Don’t settle for the straw this thing comes with, just buy the puffy applicator thing, it’s worth it. You need a super thin layer of the dust to actually kill the roaches with. If you do a thick pile, they’ll just walk around it. You want them to walk through it and bring the poison back to their nest.
customer_reviews.author: Colette R.

customer_reviews.title: seems to be working
customer_reviews.text: well I had a German roach problem not to many, but they started to show up.. a friend gave me some tools he had in his garage in a box and I think that's where they came from. its been a week since I first used the product and I haven't seen one seems to be working.
customer_reviews.author: jc

customer_reviews.title: Only true 100% roach killer
customer_reviews.text: If you have roaches, this is the only true 100% total roach killing remedy I've ever used. if you put this behind areas you know they walk through, within 5-7 days their totally gone. small infestations even quicker. Boric acid kills the roaches,and eggs dead!
customer_reviews.author: Kendall Leech

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I think harris’ products are th best for fpest control. Ive been through a lot here in NYC with roaches and bedbugs, and their products are usually the ones that do the trick. I used this along with their liquid spray (and a gel bait from another brand NOT hotshots) and the problem finally seems to be taken care of.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Mews

customer_reviews.title: Works great on Silver Fish
customer_reviews.text: Have an occasional problem with Silver Fish. Leave a few granules along the wall base board and they are soon disappear. Had a couple die right on the bait. Love it when that happens. I hate bugs. Will send some to my kids in Texas.
customer_reviews.author: Webbster

customer_reviews.title: Works well so far
customer_reviews.text: We had a serious roach problem and couldn’t figure where they were coming from. We tried multiple sprays and ultrasonic repellers without success. We cleaned up again and put some of this along nooks and crannies and saw a huge drop off in sightings. The only effective method in months.
customer_reviews.author: Proud Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Best results yet
customer_reviews.text: Great container to spread where u need it. Been fighting these roaches for awhile & this seems to have made the biggest difference. Put it around counter, back & front, and reapply to sink every nite. Pesticide guy even said it was a good thing
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: This product did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: This product advertises that it will work ion 72 hours. I placed it in different areas of my home and have not seen a decrease in the bugs. I saw an increase. Evidently it did lure them out but did not notice the powder killing them. I have german roaches. Maybe this will be good for other kinds.
customer_reviews.author: Faye

customer_reviews.title: Half full bottle
customer_reviews.text: The bottle is not even half full I just was getting ready to use it I was trying to take the red straw thing when I realized the bottle feels really light . My mom got the mail when I was at work I took the top off look inside and half the product is missing . I paid almost $14 for this . I want a refund or a replacement . Someone please contact me on my options please .
customer_reviews.author: Kerrion

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: Yeah it is good against the bugs, but the packaging is a little weird. If you tilt it upside down to spray thru the included straw, it doesnt work. You have to hold it upright. Not exactly comfortable to hold. Needs tweaks to be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sumie

customer_reviews.title: I watch them eat it, and then die.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, I unscrewed every outlet cover and dusted into the walls with this. Tablets work great too, I haven't seen any roaches in days - only the babies that come through my shower drain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe all the pain I went through having my apartment managers call in exterminators time and time again to no avail. I wish I had tried this stuff ages ago! I used both the powder and the tablets. Saw fewer roaches in 1 day. In one week they are all virtually gone! Bless you, Harris!
customer_reviews.author: Y. Buonamici

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: after a few weeks the amount of roaches in my apartment decreased significantly!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I found some roaches. I used this product and dust with it along the baseboards behind the appliances on top of the cabinets in the kitchen for a few days left it laying there don't have animals or small kids..and voila my house is bug free. Thank you Harris Boric Acid (lure) Excellent product. I hate bugs.
customer_reviews.author: Doris

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: Omg works so good. I was so stressed out about the roaches being that I live in a new apartment complex for 2years. I bought a use deep freezer a month ago and omg roaches all over my kitchen. At first it get worst after a week I haven't seen any roaches. I recommend you put in dry area and leave it for days and see the magic.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Not the best...
customer_reviews.text: They are less after using this product, but a year? Not acceptable, and they still aren't gone. I've even made this product into the egg balls from Pinterest, but the task of ridding myself of these creatures remains. :(
customer_reviews.author: C. King

customer_reviews.title: Works as it always has for decades - quick to control infestations of cockroaches and silverfish
customer_reviews.text: Works as it always has for decades - We've used this product to very quickly control and eradicate cockroach and silverfish infestations AND ants when they surface. The lure attracts them to the small containers we keep in closets, cabinets and in our patio - away from our pets.
customer_reviews.author: BobAzon

customer_reviews.title: A waste....
customer_reviews.text: Bugs walk right through this stuff. To see if it was working, my husband poured it on a bug and it carried right on. This is a waste of money no matter how much.
customer_reviews.author: Key

customer_reviews.title: Awesome awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a charm! I had bought the traps and that poison stuff in the syringe thing (that looks like peanut butter) and the roaches didn't go away. Got this stuff and within 2 weeks all were gone. Its been almost 2 months since I have seen one and I was seeing a couple a day before this! Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Be Gone Roaches!!
customer_reviews.text: Moved to a new area and to my surprise roaches are more common outside. No matter how clean your house is. These unwanted guest make their way inside. My mother-in-law advised me to purchase this and add a little sugar to help attach the pest. Started to see less of them. We even put it inside little condiment cups outside. Praying they get the hint lol.
customer_reviews.author: Ravioli Ravioli

customer_reviews.title: Ok Product
customer_reviews.text: We tried using it all over the house but didnt see the expected result
customer_reviews.author: BALA TADAVARTI

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’m disappointed with the product does not work. This product caused more roaches to arrive in my house if this product does not work, please do not buy it, it is also expensive for what it does. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Analiz r

customer_reviews.title: I guess it works?
customer_reviews.text: So I just purchased a house and there was an unmentioned roach issue (not big mind you, a very small minor issue). I decided to nip it in the butt before it began to get worse and purchased this. I used to see maybe 3 roaches a day and now I see maybe 1 every 3-4 days. I didn’t use this alone I used it with a few other products
customer_reviews.author: Laura Bythatagari

product_meta.title: HARRIS Boric Acid Roach and Silverfish Killer Powder w/Lure, 16oz
feature_bullets: Long Lasting - Continues to kill roaches, palmetto bugs, water bugs and silverfish for weeks after application as long as it's kept dry
Fast Acting - Insects coming into contact with the powder will die within 72 hours after initial contact
Easy Application - The puffer bottle with extended straw makes application quick and simple for difficult to reach areas
Contains Irresistible Lure - Harris food grade lure attracts roaches from their hiding places
EPA Registered - Made in the USA & Registered with the Environmental Protection Agency (No. 3-10) for use in homes with people and pets

specifications.Domestic Shipping: This item is available for shipping in the U.S. except for California and to select countries outside the U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More
